name: Abdallah Ali Rehab
tagline: Crafting futuristic mobile experiences with Flutter.

about.bio: Results-driven Senior Mobile Developer with 5+ years of experience delivering high-performance Flutter applications for iOS and Android. Proven expertise in leading full-cycle development from architecture design to deployment, building enterprise-grade apps with over 3M active users.

projects.name: WalaOne
projects.description: Loyalty & Rewards App. Revamped app performance, achieving 60% faster load time; implemented caching, modular architecture, and unit testing (90% coverage).

projects.name: Doam
projects.description: Public Sector Rewards Platform. Developed for public sector employees in partnership with the Ministry of Human Resources, serving 1.2M+ users. Initiated and led the development from scratch, designing the architecture, setting up CI/CD pipelines, and defining coding standards to ensure scalability and maintainability.

projects.name: WalaPlus
projects.description: Loyalty & Rewards App. Enhanced performance by implementing caching and API optimizations, achieving 40% faster load times. Implemented unit testing (Mocktail) with 60% coverage, reducing bug reports by 50%, and applied modular architecture and advanced security measures to improve maintainability and protect against reverse engineering and MiM attacks.

projects.name: WEDDnGO
projects.description: Wedding Marketplace: Egypt's largest wedding marketplace; delivered booking and vendor management features; featured on Shark Tank Egypt.
